channel.title: Sellsword still doesnt win with Unseen
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was Sellsword, Unseen won the game, I lost. For the record, I was dead at the end of the game, if that matters.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I was supposed to win alongside the Unseen.
#### Steps to reproduce: Play as Sellsword, perhaps die? When Unseen wins bug is reproduced.
#### Comments: I don't know if this also affects cult or NK wins. I'd assume so, but don't have actual ingame experience.

item.title: Sellsword still doesnt win with Unseen
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
I assume you don’t still have logs for this since it was a few days ago, but the bug is known.

I believe Sellsword only wins if they additionally live, which should be fixed in the next patch.

Read full topic
item.source: Sellsword still doesnt win with Unseen

item.title: Sellsword still doesnt win with Unseen
item.dc:creator: hesse
item.description:
I should add that this also applies to the Inquisitor. This happens even if he isn’t dead at the end of the game.

Read full topic
item.source: Sellsword still doesnt win with Unseen

if you aren’t solo carrying scum as sellsword you ain’t doing it right fam
